-- SELECT * FROM house_location a, house_deal b where a.house_num = b.house_num
SELECT * FROM house_location a, house_list b, (select * from house_picture where house_picture_num in (select max(house_picture_num) from house_picture group by house_num)) c where a.house_num = b.house_num and b.house_num = c.house_num and c.house_num = a.house_num and approval = 1
